snippet: The C.D.C. advises that children sit in the back seat until age 13. One look at any middle school drop-off will show that most of us aren't following that advice. Are you?
abstract: The C.D.C. advises that children sit in the back seat until age 13. One look at any middle school drop-off will show that most of us aren't following that advice. Are you?

headline.main: When Can a Child Ride in the Front Seat?
